'''Boom Shaka-Laka, More Boom-Shaka-Laka''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to find [[Xiangling]] during the commission ''[[The Gourmet Supremos: Breakthrough Thinking]].''

==Notes==
* Xiangling can be found southwest of [[Qingce Village]], and can be spoken to as long as the player hasn't spoken to [[Xudong]] again.
